website_summaries.verdict: Organic in look yet technologically advanced in functionality.
pros: A natural-looking case that hides its strong magnet to maintain aesthetic appeal
Customers appreciate the wood touches and overall feel of this case
We love the material's flexibility while maintaining its overall shape and structure
cons: Some felt it didn't offer a lot of protection

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome case. I was looking for something that provided ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome case. I was looking for something that provided more grip for my iPhone 7+ (Matte Black) and this did the trick. The wood grain is awesome, and even though it is really wood, it's completely flexible. The phone fits in the case with my screen protector, and there are no gaps where dust and such and find it way into the case. The Black Rose color is a perfect combination with the matte black iPhone, it looks beautiful and the synchronize well with each other. The product was shipped timely and arrived within the 2 days. Fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: TheZoop

customer_reviews.title: Good buy if you have a magnet phone holder
customer_reviews.text: Works great to give a better connection to my magnet in my car to hold my phone. I love that the magnet doesn't move around like in other phone cases and it looks and feels great.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Phone Case!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! It actually looks like real wood. The case is plastic with just a thin piece of wood covering the back. Still very bendable and fit my iPhone 7+ perfect. Have dropped my phone quite of few times with it on and it does a great job protecting. Also love the feel and grip of it.
customer_reviews.author: TAB

customer_reviews.title: Just right.
customer_reviews.text: This cover is just right & allows the phone to still fit in the pockets of my tactical pants. There is some compromise in protection from a beefier design, of course, but I think it's just right. Nice design is easy to grip.
customer_reviews.author: bobusn

customer_reviews.title: Gets loose over time
customer_reviews.text: The case looks and functions great in the beginning but gets loose over time. After a few months of usage, it can now barely stay on the phone. The corners and edges splits from the phone with a light touch.
customer_reviews.author: Lian

customer_reviews.title: Nice, attractive case
customer_reviews.text: Great case. Looks nice on the phone and easy to grip. Doesn't add a lot of bulk. I got a lot of compliments on this case.
customer_reviews.author: ziggy787

customer_reviews.title: Yep
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Nice look. Solid fit. The slip resistant backing is nice. It is snug but easy to install. It's soft enough that I expect it will help with impact resistance. Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: djthriller

customer_reviews.title: A must buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is actually going to have to be my favorite case I’ve ever purchased. I LOVE the feel of it, smooth and has grip, NOT AT ALL bulky but still protective. Amazing price too! 5 Stars!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Shop around
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy and when you squeeze side to unlock it comes off phone
customer_reviews.author: rcolac

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: The first one did have an magnetic ability so we returned it and thought another, Thought it was going to work but didn't. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: LAP

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: Great phone case, I have had mine over two years and it’s has protected my phone from many falls. It is just now starting to wear on the sides.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice case except for the circle on the inside where the magnetic goes leaves a circle on your phone
customer_reviews.author: W. Neighbor

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good case. Looks nice, reasonable and minimalist protection. Wood is starting to peel off unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: A little loose-fitting
customer_reviews.text: It has a terrific look and feel, I just wish it fit a little tighter.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Kaplan

customer_reviews.title: black rose
customer_reviews.text: super awesome case for the price, looks better in person! authentic grainy feel to it. bought it for my 7+
customer_reviews.author: Shawny Mac

customer_reviews.title: Looks good!
customer_reviews.text: Really like the look of it. I wish it was a little harder rubber. A little too flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Emersonsdad

customer_reviews.title: Stand out from the crowd
customer_reviews.text: Not the sturdiest of cases, so I wouldn't recommend if you tend to drop your phone a lot, but definitely unique and well made.
customer_reviews.author: D McG

customer_reviews.title: Nice case, fits well and does not slip
customer_reviews.text: Nice case, fits well and does not slip, which is my most important criterion. However, the alleged magnetic plate does not work. I had to insert one into the case to make it useful.
customer_reviews.author: Col. Kilgore Trout

customer_reviews.title: Aesthetically it's cool. Fits the phone well
customer_reviews.text: Aesthetically it's cool. Fits the phone well, and can be removed easily. But if you're looking for something very protective, it's probably not for you.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful case. Great feel. Getting lots of compliments about it.
customer_reviews.author: MommaTes

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: Held strong for 4 years! Very durable and still looks new
customer_reviews.author: Akash

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great, begins to wear down the wood after 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: SquirrelEggs

customer_reviews.title: I love how cool my phone looks in this case
customer_reviews.text: I love how cool my phone looks in this case. Even though I have a gold iphone, it still looks pretty good. The feeling is also very nice and I got couple compliments on my phone case.
customer_reviews.author: Akhlyse

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this case looks great and it wear off only after 2 years! there are still surprises i guess
customer_reviews.author: anastasia

customer_reviews.title: Best cover pest price.
customer_reviews.text: I love the feel and thickness (not to thin not to thick) of this cover. I keep purchasing it when I change phones. It is that nice.
customer_reviews.author: william morse

customer_reviews.title: Good.
customer_reviews.text: Great cover. Love how it fit the phone and the grip is great too. Will offer good protection. Good quality
customer_reviews.author: momo

customer_reviews.title: I have had this case for almost a year and ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had this case for almost a year and it still looks brand new. FYI I am not a careful iPhone user... I throw my phone around lol.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: good case but doesnt work well with my mount
customer_reviews.text: Nice case overall but it does not work well with my magnetic mount.
customer_reviews.author: Dan A

customer_reviews.title: This case is beautiful; adds very little bulk to your phone
customer_reviews.text: Pro:This case is beautiful; adds very little bulk to your phone.
customer_reviews.author: Trey

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy case and has a good feel to it
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it!! Was a gift for him. Very sturdy case and has a good feel to it.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary

customer_reviews.title: Good looking case
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend. He has the big protective case, otter box, due to his work but he puts this case on the phone during the weekends. He wanted a case that wasn't too bulky during the weekend and this worked out perfectly. It is a good looking case and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Meliha

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: Not a tight grip around the sides of the phone as advertised numerous times. The metallic magnet piece is NOT magnetic. If so it's so weak that it would stick to anything else magnetic. The wood on the back is wood, but when it's treated like it is it loses its appeal. All-in-all this case was very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: austin

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: The case is not magnetic!!! It does not work with mounts!!! DECEPTIVE
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Attractive Case with Magnet Option
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this case because of the magnet option. I use a car mount that is magnetic, so I liked the idea of having a case that hides the magnet, rather that having an unsightly magnet stuck to the back of another case. When the case arrived, I was happy to see it hid the magnet in a little recessed spot inside of the case. I also like that the case is flexible, easy to take off and put on in a snap. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Magnet is horrible. Don’t buy if that is a feature you’re looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Nice phone case but magnetic component is the main reason I decided on this particular one. I tend to place my phone on any magnetic surface when I’m at the gym, cleaning or when I’m getting ready in the morning. The magnetic piece with this case is horrible. It can not even hold the phone, let alone pick up any magnetic surfaces. No at all satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: veronica anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain
customer_reviews.text: For a cheap case, this is my favorite at the moment. the fake wood looks nice and has a texture to it. There is a "cut out" for a metal circle if you use a magnet mounting system in your car or something also.
customer_reviews.author: RealMrBurgundy

customer_reviews.title: Works great, didn't realize it came with a magnet for ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great, didn't realize it came with a magnet for the magnetized phone holders for dash or vents, very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Minton1229

customer_reviews.title: Real wood look is AWESOME!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is the best case I have ever owned. Love the wood. It is very thin and works great with my magnetic mount in my car. Recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: Digisuite

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive, makes the phone less likely to jump out of your hand.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, very attractive, makes the phone easier to grip... iPhones seem to want to squirt out of my hands and this helps fix that a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. & Mrs.

customer_reviews.title: Buy this case!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This case is awesome! This is my daily case.. not a whole lot of protection but the buttons feel nice and it looks cool with the phone! My new favorite case
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I liked the case, but the wood started peeling off within 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Too flexible and too loose of a fit around phone. Sent back.
customer_reviews.author: ADRIAN

customer_reviews.title: Still looks and performs like new.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this case for 3 months now. Still looks and performs like new.
customer_reviews.author: JHeid

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Has a nice clean feel to it. Nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Gza Rza

customer_reviews.title: Hassle free case
customer_reviews.text: Great feel and fit. Easy to push buttons. Holes where they should be. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Cakeeg312

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just a great case. I've had a lot of comments about it will buy more from this company
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great finish. I keep getting asked about these covers. Pretty easy to take them off too
customer_reviews.author: Nimish Shrivastava

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking.
customer_reviews.text: No comment. I ordered for the wrong phone, however it was promptly refunded.
customer_reviews.author: N2Deep

product_meta.title: iPhone 7 Plus Case, ROCK [Grained] - Black Rose [Origin][Non Slip] [Built-in Magnetic Metal Plate] [Wood Tactile] [Natural Wood and TPU Rubber] [Fingerprint Free] Case For Apple iPhone 7 Plus
feature_bullets: 1.Unique design---100% Real Wood. Natural Synthetic Case. Combined with Genuine wood Layer & Premium TPU Rubber, it's high end nice design for Apple iPhone 7 Plus (Not iPhone 7)
2.Durable & Comfortable Partner---A Soft non-slip and great feeling touching natural wooden case. Fingerprints and smudges free, non slip, not bulky, Slim, great tactile feel, flexible cover.

3.Practical Protector---Easy access to all buttons.The case can protect the screen, lens, and bumper edges very well; But we highly Recommend to match this case with a Screen Protector to avoid screen shattered once dropped on uneven floors. Best Structure Design make the cover like a glove, fits tight to the phone, but easy to remove as well.
4.Universal Metal Plate Bonus---The Universal Metal plate inside the casing makes it easy to connect and remove the phone from the stand.

5.Healthy---No Weird Chemical Smells. The case is combined with Natural Wood Layer (Sandalwood) and High-end TPU Rubber. **The product picture and the actual product may vary slightly on the color due to lighting and flash when pictures are taken.**

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars82 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
